original_text: My Christian friends, not many of you should become teachers. We people who teach God's message must be very careful. When God judges everybody, he will demand more from us than from other people.
korean_text: 내 형제들아 너희는 선생된 우리가 더 큰 심판을 받을 줄 알고 선생이 많이 되지 말라

sentences.original_text: not many of you should become teachers
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 많은 사람들이 선생이 되어서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: We people who teach God's message
he will demand more from us
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리에게 더 많은 것을 요구하실 것이다
